channel.title: How do i post an npc on the ground?
channel.description:
ive done it before, accidentall, but i dont remember the code, ne1 no?
:confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: December 10, 2006, 04:44:22 PM[/size][hr]i know now, so if u didnt no, the code is ::npc [insert npc code]

item.title: How do i post an npc on the ground?
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Okay, Type::coordson and walk on top of the spot you want the npc.
Then write these coords down.
Open up autospawn
enter the npc id and the coords

Read full topic
item.source: How do i post an npc on the ground?

item.title: How do i post an npc on the ground?
item.dc:creator: @Dukly Dukly
item.description:
@Dukly wrote:

[quote=“Avenged pwn, post:1, topic:34143”]ive done it before, accidentall, but i dont remember the code, ne1 no?

[br][size=1]Posted at: December 10, 2006, 04:44:22 PM[/size][hr]i know now, so if u didnt no, the code is
::npc [insert npc code][/quote]
How fun, NPC’s
